screen.immersivemc.config.title: ImmersiveMC Config
screen.immersivemc.backpack_config.title: Bag Customization
Attaches the backpack to the other side of the hand for left-handed people.
config.immersivemc.low_detail_backpack.d: Use a lower-detailed backpack model that fits more with Minecraft's aesthetics.
screen.immersivemc.immersives_config.sub: Note: Any immersives that are disabled by server admins override your settings here!
screen.immersivemc.immersives_config.can: Can't change the config right now! Wait a bit for the server's config to sync!
config.immersivemc.animals.desc: Hold food or an item used to tame an animal in one hand, then hold both hands at the animal to tame it!
config.immersivemc.anvil.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the anvil immersive.
config.immersivemc.armor.desc: Allows VR users to equip armor by physically placing armor pieces on their person.
config.immersivemc.backpack_button.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use backpacks. VR Only!
config.immersivemc.beacon.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the beacon immersive.
config.immersivemc.brewing.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the brewing stand immersive.
config.immersivemc.button.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to push buttons with their hand.
config.immersivemc.campfire.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to hold food above a campfire to cook it.
config.immersivemc.chest.desc: Enables/disables the ability for players to open/close chests without the GUI. Make sure to enable 'Right Click Chests' to use the chest outside of VR! You can punch the chest to cycle which items are on top!
config.immersivemc.door.desc: Enables/disables the opening and closing of doors and fence gates using hand motions.
config.immersivemc.crafting.desc: Enables/disables the placing of items physically on the crafting table.
config.immersivemc.enchanting_table.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the enchanting table immersive.
config.immersivemc.furnace.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the furnace immersive.
config.immersivemc.hoe.desc: Enables/disables the abiilty to swing a hoe at the ground to till it and to swing it to harvest wheat.
config.immersivemc.jukebox.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to physically put discs in the jukebox.
config.immersivemc.lever.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to physically flick levers.
config.immersivemc.pet.desc: Whether VR players can pet pets they have tamed (or animals that are tamed for everyone once tamed).
config.immersivemc.ranged_grab.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to grab items by flicking their wrist after holding down the trigger.
config.immersivemc.repeater.desc: Enables/disables the ability for VR players to physically move redstone repeater torches.
config.immersivemc.shield.desc: When enabled, allows VR users to hold their shields in the direction of something to block it; no need to right click!
config.immersivemc.shulker.desc: Enables/disables the ability to use the Shulker Box immersive. You can punch the Shulker Box to cycle which items are shown!
config.immersivemc.center_brewing.desc: When enabled, item placements for the brewing stand are centered, rather than emulate the GUI.
config.immersivemc.center_furnace.desc: When enabled, item placements for the furnace are centered, rather than emulate the GUI.
config.immersivemc.right_click_chest.des: When enabled, the immersive chest is opened/closed through a right click, rather than a hand motion. This allows Non-VR players to use the chest immersion! Punch the chest to cycle which row you have selected.
config.immersivemc.show_placement_guide: Show Aqua Boxes to Guide in ImmersiveMC
When enabled, uses aqua-colored boxes to show where immersives can be interacted with.
Whether the output of a crafting table that's shown above the table should slowly spin.
config.immersivemc.placement_mode.1: Place a Quarter of the Items
config.immersivemc.placement_mode.desc: When right-clicking or placing items into immersives, %s from the stack of items in your hand into the immersive.
config.immersivemc.pet_any_living.desc: When enabled while the ability to pet is also enabled, VR users can pet any living entity, rather than just pets they own.
config.immersivemc.use_pick_range: Use Pick Range as Ranged Grab Range
config.immersivemc.right_click_in_vr.des: Allow right-clicking in VR to interact with immersives, similarly to non-VR users.
config.immersivemc.3d_compat.desc: Moves the item areas for immersives to increase compatability with resource packs such as Classic 3D (16x).
config.immersivemc.crouch_bypass_immersi: When crouching, right-clicks bypass immersions and open vanilla interfaces.
